data.instruction: Extract PII entities from the paragraph given

examples.input: I withdrew $100 from the bank in London from my phone (345) 123-7867 and email raj@gmail.com. Regards, Raj
examples.output:
$100: Amount,
London: Location,
(345) 123-7867: PhoneNumber,
Raj: Person,
raj@gmail.com: Email

examples.input: I am not able to transact on my card 3572267594198019 since 20th March, 2023. Please check the issue. Thanks, Mary Smith
examples.output:
Mary Smith: Person,
3572267594198019: CardNumber,
20th March, 2023: Date

examples.input: Please send me the OTP at (123)1234567. Thanks, David
I lost my card in London on 1st Jan, 2023. My card number is 3572267594198019.
